practical_performance.name: Practical Performance (PP)
practical_performance.description: A practical Performance (PP) assessment will provide direct evidence of whether candidates have acquired the competency for the ability statements by solving a scenario-based problem.
practical_performance.focus: The Practical Performance (PP) assessment focuses on providing authentic 'Show Me Application' evidence of candidates' ability to apply Azure cloud computing skills in realistic scenarios.
tasks: Candidates will complete a series of practical tasks that demonstrate their ability to assess, implement, and review Azure cloud computing solutions.

evidence.LO1: Candidates will configure Azure services to meet specific requirements, demonstrating their ability to assess cloud solutions and specifications.
evidence.LO2: Candidates will implement an Azure cloud solution based on a provided plan, showcasing their ability to develop an implementation plan.
evidence.LO3: Candidates will use Azure monitoring tools and logs to identify and resolve implementation issues, proving their ability to develop review processes.

submission: Candidates will submit configuration files, deployment scripts, and screenshots of the deployed Azure environment.
They will also submit a troubleshooting report detailing the issues encountered and how they were resolved.
practical_performance.retention_period: All submitted evidence, including configuration files, deployment scripts, screenshots, and troubleshooting reports, will be retained for 3 years to ensure compliance with institutional policies and for auditing purposes.
